monster.name: Beast of the Cave (LaserLlama)

trait.name: Hit Points
trait.text: 5 + five times your ranger level

trait.name: Hit Dice
trait.text: The Beast has a total number of d8 Hit Dice equal to your Ranger level. It also gains all the normal benefits of both short and long rests.

trait.name: Armor Class
trait.text: 13 + PB (natural armor)

trait.name: Tremorsense
trait.text: The Beast knows the location of anything in contact with the ground within 30 ft.

trait.name: Primal Bond
trait.text: You can add your proficiency bonus to any ability check or saving throw that the Beast makes.

action.name: Claw
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +2 +PB to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1d6 +2 +PB slashing damage.

monster.description: Source: LaserLlama's Ranger Archetypes v.3.0.0 p. 12 (Homebrew)

trait.name: Hit Points
trait.text: 5 + five times your ranger level (the beast has a number of Hit Dice [d8s] equal to your ranger level)

trait.name: Hit Dice
trait.text: The Beast has a total number of d8 Hit Dice equal to your Ranger level. It also gains all the normal benefits of both short and long rests.

trait.name: Armor Class
trait.text: 13 + PB (natural armor)

trait.name: Charge
trait.text: If the Beast moves at least 20 ft. in a line toward a target and hits it with a Maul attack, the target takes bonus slashing damage equal to a roll of your Quarry Die. If it is Large or smaller it must succeed on a Strength saving throw or fall prone.

trait.name: Primal Bond
trait.text: You can add your proficiency bonus to any ability check or saving throw that the Beast makes.

action.name: Maul
action.text: Maul. Melee Weapon Attack: +2 +PB to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1d8 +2 +PB slashing damage.

trait.name: Hit Points
trait.text: 5 + five times your ranger level (the beast has a number of Hit Dice [d8s] equal to your ranger level)

trait.name: Hit Dice
trait.text: The Beast has a total number of d8 Hit Dice equal to your Ranger level. It also gains all the normal benefits of both short and long rests.

trait.name: Armor Class
trait.text: 13 + PB (natural armor)

trait.name: Amphibious
trait.text: The Beast can breathe in air and water.

trait.name: Primal Bond
trait.text: You can add your proficiency bonus to any ability check or saving throw that the Beast makes.

action.name: Pseudopod
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +2 +PB to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1d6 +2 +PB bludgeoning damage, and if the target is Large or smaller, it can choose to instantly grapple it (escape DC equal to your Spell save DC). While grappling a creature, it can only use its Pseudopod to attack that creature.

trait.name: Hit Points
trait.text: 4 + four times your ranger level (the beast has a number of Hit Dice [d6s] equal to your ranger level)

trait.name: Hit Dice
trait.text: The Beast has a total number of d8 Hit Dice equal to your Ranger level. It also gains all the normal benefits of both short and long rests.

trait.name: Armor Class
trait.text: 13 + PB (natural armor)

trait.name: Flyby
trait.text: The Beast doesn't provoke opportunity attacks when it flies out of an enemy's reach.

trait.name: Primal Bond
trait.text: You can add your proficiency bonus to any ability check or saving throw that the Beast makes.

action.name: Shred
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +3 +PB to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1d4 +3 +PB slashing damage.

monster.name: Draconic Companion (LaserLlama)
monster.languages: Draconic, understands any languages spoken by the Drake Guard bound to it.

trait.name: Hit Points
trait.text: 5 + four times your ranger level (the beast has a number of Hit Dice [d8s] equal to your ranger level)

trait.name: Hit Dice
trait.text: The Beast has a total number of d8 Hit Dice equal to your Ranger level. It also gains all the normal benefits of both short and long rests.

trait.name: Armor Class
trait.text: 14 + PB (natural armor)

trait.name: Hit Dice
trait.text: Your Companion has a total number of d8 Hit Dice equal to your Ranger level. It also gains all the normal benefits of both short and long rests.

trait.name: Soul Bound
trait.text: You add your PB to any ability check or saving throw that the Draconic Companion makes.

action.name: Claw
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +3 +PB to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1d4 +3 +PB slashing damage + 1d4 Essence damage.

monster.description: Source: LaserLlama's Alternate Ranger v4.3.0 p. 14 (Homebrew)
